node.title: 10. Adopt Christ's Lifestyle
node.description:
What is the lifestyle of the revived Christian? This is a paradym shifting session when we consider what Jesus meant when he invited us to take up His yoke and learn from Him. We will discover that meakness is the Christians power.

 

For PDF series guide, click here: 

http://www.path2prayer.com/article/1192/revival-and-holy-spirit/books-sermons/new-resources/discipleheart#RevivalNowBentonHarbor
